events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit at all. I want to know how I can get a refund.
The reported issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on customer's mention of wanting their money back.
Assigning the case to customer support agent Alice who handles refund related inquiries.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want a refund for your jacket that does not fit. Iâ€™m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Order number is 987654321. Yes, the jacket is still new, tags attached, and unopened in the original packaging.
Great! You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid return label offer.
The refund process has been initiated and return label sent. Your refund will be processed once we receive the item.
We are following up to confirm the receipt of the returned jacket and to update you on the refund status.
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for your cooperation.
